alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Floyd; Howard; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 31 at 12:32PM CST until January 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle expected this afternoon and evening with potential for a light glaze of ice. Very cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero expected late tonight into Saturday morning. * WHERE...Mitchell, Howard, Floyd and Chickasaw Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions this afternoon and evening, which will impact holiday travelers. Cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and drive with extra caution on icy roads. Use caution while outside in the cold. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
